reviewText: This show has my daughter glued to the TV. I love how friendly and fun the cartoon is. I would recommend it.
Such a cute cartoon, even I like watching it! So glad to see this now on DVD. Brings so many of the traditional fairy tales into one story while teaching good lessons.
My daughter loves Goldie and Bear. We were very happy to see a DVD come out for it. She loves watching it. It's a good amount of time long too.
Grandsons favorite!

Such a great deal!!! Purchased for my 16 month old daughter to watch in the car on a 4 hour drive and it was a life saver!

My daughter loves it and for me is the best thing because I hate the radiation of the phone I prefer that she watches this dvd with lots of beautiful episodes and the price is amazing I give it 10000000000 stars

For some reason this is my son's favorite show. He smiles like crazy when the theme song comes on. The DVD is great, however, the center ring that keeps the DVD in place was broken in our case so the DVD came loose inside the case. Wasn't scratched so we kept it.
These videos are wonderful! I use them for my kindergarten students after reading fairy tales. My granddaughter loves them too. Stories include characters from many fairy tales.  Very cute.

My daughter is obsessed with Goldie and bear!!! I wish there were more stuff available from this show. Super glad I ran up on this DVD though. The episodes on this DVD are some of her favorite! And a parent perk....it doesn't make me absolutely crazy! We all know those cartoons...haha!

Excelent product!!!

As a Gran of a 2-year old, I had to spend considerable time searching for and viewing toddler entertainment, looking for that blend of quality that makes it worth watching, This was an immediate hit with me AND my granddaughter, who is now age 3 and still considers it a favorite. There are several short, wholesome, and entertaining stories that are age appropriate for toddlers (as young as 2s and 3s), and depict positive life lessons, while cleverly folding in fairy tale characters outside the Goldilocks & the Three Bears yarn. Further, the production values (audio and video) are excellent. I couldn't ask for more.
Wonderful
